com.iLabs.spice.common.config
Interface ConfigurationInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConfigurationHandler
public interface ConfigurationInterface

This is the interface that isolates the low level details of apache commons configuration to proide an easy to user interface as per the application configuration requirements.

Method Summary

          This method is used to return the configuration base path

Method Detail

getConfigSubset

ConfigurationInterface getConfigSubset(java.lang.String propertyGroup)
This method returns a subset of the configuration. This is particularly applicable in of hierarical property file (XML).

Parameters:
propertyGroup - This is the name of the property that defines the subset to be returned
Returns:
The return is IConfig which is a subset of the entire configuration.

getList

ConfigurationInterface[] getList(java.lang.String propertyName)
This method returns a list property values matching the property name.

Parameters:
propertyName - This parameter consists of the parameter name
Returns:
This is an array containing all the property values
